website_summaries.verdict: Can get your full-sized cooler out of the raft, boat or canoe for floating and lake time.
pros: Includes sturdy side handles and 2 rope ties to help keep your cooler close
Floats well and does not make your cooler top-heavy
cons: The size on this is large and may be too large for your needs

customer_reviews.title: Big, durable, and good value
customer_reviews.text: Took this for a float trip. It was calm waters, no heavy rapids, just a booze cruise. But this thing kept a solid hold on our 60qt cooler that held food and drinks. It doesn't come with a rope but we had something to tie it to our raft. It's the kind of material on inner tubes you see at water parks, the sturdy kind. For the money I think it's a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas A. Snow

customer_reviews.title: SUMMER FLOATING DONE RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough good things about this raft! Pros: extra sturdy, durable, used on multiple floats where got beat up for rocks. Use this for my speaker cooler. Carries the weight just fine. Didn’t sink. Held air multiple trips without refill. No leaks, dings, cuts, scrapes!
customer_reviews.author: BatmanSully

customer_reviews.title: Floated our RTIC 65
customer_reviews.text: We used this cooler raft with my RTIC 65 cooler. The cooler fits snug and perfect into the raft. We floated a river where we sometimes had to drag it over a sand or gravel bar and it held up with no damage. The cooler was loaded with 30 beers, 24 other canned drinks, lunch for 6 people and a 20-pound bag of ice. It had no troubles at all floating the cooler and this heavy load.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was the envy of all other floaters on the river! It was stable and sturdy. We scraped across some rocks and had no worries. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Michele K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for tubing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this raft in August of 2013. Have used it a few times a year to tube down the Salt river in AZ. Just completed another successful trip today. This thing had help up amazingly well. Plenty of room for a decent size Cooler, dry bags, and even a couple small paddles. Handles are stout, and the cup holders work great for drinks, sunblock, etc.
customer_reviews.author: 95HATCH

customer_reviews.title: Best cooler float for river trip!
customer_reviews.text: This raft stoop up to dragging across the rocks on our recent river trip and held my large heavy cooler up high.. even room To stuff some towels and others items all kept dry.. my husband was skeptical but it held up so well. didn’t even notice I was pulling it behind my kayak! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is made from sturdy materials, thick raft and heavy duty handles
customer_reviews.text: This raft fit our large cooler. It kept it high enough above the water that it did not drag when we went over shallow rocky rapids. In the few spots that it did hit rocks, it did not puncture or tear the raft. It is made from sturdy materials, thick raft and heavy duty handles.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Can handle the rocks--fits a big cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great tube. High quality. I took this thing down the Frio River in Texas summer 2014. The river was running a little low due to lack of rain, so there were plenty of shallow spots where it was pulled over rocks. came out like a champ. It also holds a pretty good sized cooler. Also, here is a little tip/heads-up. The air pump nozzle this thing requires is the same one that blows up Coleman air mattresses (and most all air mattresses i assume). So if you have a Coleman air pump for an air mattresses, you should be made in the shade.
customer_reviews.author: JD Holzheauser

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you are floating the river.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Borth

customer_reviews.title: Durable thick plastic
customer_reviews.text: I towed it behind my kayak down the Delaware River (between NY and PA) with out a problem. I bought a cooler the size of the opening so it would fit tightly in the opening. I would guess the weight of the cooler with ice and beer was approx 50 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler tube
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a river tubing trip to hold a booler (boom box cooler). Perfect size and very durable material and construction. My only complaint and why I gave it 4/5 stars is because the one I received had a slight twist in the one side that just made it look a little off. But it functioned great and it seems that I will be able to get many more river trips out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Holds Up Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Held our yeti cooler with wheels. We ran into many sticks that we thought should have popped it but that never happened. Bought 2 of these and 1 Ozark cooler float for our group. The Ozark float didn’t make it a 1/4 of the trip and was done. I highly recommend the Soltice Float!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great raft
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my tubeing event. It was delivered promptly and was well packaged. Very heavy vinyl fabric and well constructed. I would highly recommend this raft.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well if you don't blow up the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I definitely recommend buying this product. Just don't blow up the small bottom chamber because it can make the cooler easier to tip over (which happened to us in mild rapids while tubing down the American River in Sacramento... not fun).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Eslinger

customer_reviews.title: Held up like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Very very impressed with this raft. It fits my cooler perfectly. Biggest factor is this raft held up on the Chattahoochee River like a champ. The cooler had about 90 beers and a couple bags worth of ice, so to say the least it was weighed down. It got snagged and dragged on tons of rock and no damage came to it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Newman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: We floated the Frio River (Easy level float) with this tube one time (used it to hold a radio cooler) and there's already a tear in the bottom of it and the float won't hold air long. During a 4 hour float, we had to stop to blow it up two times...def not worth the $50 bucks we spent
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very, very high quality. Used it for river tripping and it got stuck with pretty sharp tree limbs and drug across jagged rocks. Has my large cooler stocked full ( heavy ) and this more than stood up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Great for river floating
customer_reviews.text: I bought and used this on two river floating trips this year. Held up wonderfully even though it had to be pulled over some rocks in areas where the water was low. My only problem is that it's very difficult to handle alone and the balls that you use to wrap to hold the handles have popped through while trying to tie down the handles. They slid back on easily enough though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie F. Hott

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy float for the job intended
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy raft perfect for lugging coolers on our recent river float trip. Fit 2 medium coolers loaded with beverages and lunches.
customer_reviews.author: L. Salazar

customer_reviews.title: For my cooler radio
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to float a Coleman cooler I converted into a radio. Raft seems stout, and cooler fits securely. It has made it through one float season fine. Hoping to get many more out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H

customer_reviews.title: Rolling down the Elkhorn River!
customer_reviews.text: Rolling down the river! Floated down the Elkhorn River several times in 2013 with this raft in tow. This raft held the cooler steady without incident.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Staroscik

customer_reviews.title: Two four hour trips down the Frio river
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Floats in six inches of water with a fully loaded ice chest. Only had to drag it a couple times. Didn't even come close to tipping it over. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Float the Boat
customer_reviews.text: The rectangle tube kept our floating cooler-radio system high and dry on our recent vacation to the river. Looking forward to many happy returns to the river and listening to good music on our floating trips.
customer_reviews.author: Madampreztx

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good tube
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good tube. Seems to be made of a durable material. The cup holders are made of a strong plastic so they won't get crushed during storage. It holds our biggest cooler with a little room to spare. Has no problem staying a float with cooler completely filled. Would have gave it more stars but on our fourth use it started leaking. Turned out to be the Boston valve was leaking. Cheap fix, so not a big deal. All in all I think it's a decent tube for the money
customer_reviews.author: Dean Larson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to our Kayak trip
customer_reviews.text: This raft perfectly fit my cooler and stayed afloat the whole trip. It has a large air filling port which was compatible with both our manual kayak pump and our car air pump. Great for towing behind a raft or kayak!
customer_reviews.author: Christy L

customer_reviews.title: Used it on the river with no issues. Survived ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it on the river with no issues. Survived the tube chutes with no issues and was big enough to hold the coolers and have someone ride in it. A floating bar!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This will fit a very large cooler! Unfortunately mine ...
customer_reviews.text: This will fit a very large cooler! Unfortunately mine did pop the same day I used it but it ended up scraping some heavy brush.
customer_reviews.author: cara

customer_reviews.title: We take this down the Guadeloupe river ever year. ...
customer_reviews.text: We take this down the Guadeloupe river ever year. I carry a 60qt cooler on wheels and a 28th cooler stereo in it am yet to have an issue! Extremely durable and plenty of room!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Went tubing down a river that at parts was barely a couple feet deep. This product held my cooler filled with adult beverages and food. Didn't think it would work cause the cooler was heavy but exceeded my expectations. Love this product. Will definitely be using this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Makes floating the rivers in Texas that much better
customer_reviews.author: Bluebonner Belle

customer_reviews.title: Good product and fun
customer_reviews.text: Comes as advertised, and generally has held up well. That said, I did have to return the first product due to it breaking a seam around a cup holder. It is likely that someone overinflated it raft to cause this, but it wasn't by much if so. Just be careful to not do that and overall this should last.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: but it looks like a winner
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the opportunity to use it on the river in South Texas, but it looks like a winner.
customer_reviews.author: MsTin

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This item is pretty sturdy and solid. I liked the cup holders and place to tie to canoe or raft.
customer_reviews.author: Musetta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly and is very rugged. Took on a canoe trip
customer_reviews.author: Ted Bear

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty for coolers.
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy. used several times this year on float trips with very loaded down cooler. would also make a great raft for a small child or 2.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Espy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is plenty big for your large cooler, and has the capacity to float a well packed cooler! Can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This ice chest holder is huge - and totally cool!! We loved it and were very happy that we purchased it. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!1
customer_reviews.text: Looks bigger in real time..Holds the cooler well in rapids
customer_reviews.author: Albert Marino

customer_reviews.title: RADIO COOLER FLOAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good... It fit perfectly in my 75 quart Rubbermaid. We'll see how it does on the float down the river!!!
customer_reviews.author: Humberto J.

customer_reviews.title: Tough and HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Really does fit a 50 qt cooler...or one small person and a 20qt cooler! Very tough PVC, will last a long time if you treat it right!
customer_reviews.author: V. Stiens

customer_reviews.title: This cooler raft is great! It is spacious and made of quality material
customer_reviews.text: This cooler raft is great! It is spacious and made of quality material. We were able to fit 2 of our smaller coolers in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: I took this down Pine Creek in PA where there are class III rapids. I was in a kayak, so didn't have room for the beer when we arrived at camp and this thing worked flawlessly. A raft pulled this behind them and didn't even notice it being there. I didn't try pulling with the yak, simply because I was worried it would take me out of the line I wanted to be in. Maybe next time. I had about 90 beers and 10 pounds of chicken breast loaded into this thing and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Missing valve closure.
customer_reviews.text: Leaving one star for now. Did not come with valve closure on the raft. Will not hold air. Bought it for this weekend and now it's pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon T Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Solstice cooler raft
customer_reviews.text: We took this product on the Frio river even with the water low and flowing slow we went on. We had to drag tubes and the solstice cooler raft over some pretty bad areas but the raft held up good this product is made of some thick material and held up well. Very good and dependable product.
customer_reviews.author: Jnarev

customer_reviews.title: This raft workex great! It is sturdy and durable and was used ...
customer_reviews.text: This raft workex great! It is sturdy and durable and was used while tubing down a river. The cup holders and cooler tie down cords are a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Jared C. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Works well, would of given 5 stars but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, would of given 5 stars but I had to patch a staple hole qhen I first got it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: M Carr

customer_reviews.title: I take this raft on the Frio River in Texas ...
customer_reviews.text: I take this raft on the Frio River in Texas. had no problems pulling on top on the low spots on the river. Very thick material.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it because cooler opening is too big for my largest cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: The best 30.00 bucks I ever spent on a cooler raft , Its the perfect fit for my cooler . I highly recommend it for your river trips
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: When I read "fits full size cooler" I had my doubts, but it was true. It was deffinantly larger than I expected and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: N.Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not really a toy, but a GREAT flotation device for coolers.
customer_reviews.text: Great for tubing down the river, no problems with it at all. I was able to fit 2 coolers on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sly K

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tube heavy duty held up fine on the river with 110qt igloo cooler
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great for River Tubing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this raft for our annual Tubing trip down the river. It's absolutely perfect. It fits the cooler (and then some) and even has cup holders for your drinks. It worked out very well and I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Radioactivebugs

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love how big this raft is. It will easily fit a standard size cooler and lots of beverages for the Regatta.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and it deflated by the end of my float trip
customer_reviews.author: Justin dragovich

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I think these tubes were great! There was one point when we were driving down the road that our tubes fell out at least 3 times. 3 different people in our group bought these tubes and when it came time to get into the water only one was losing air. I became worried but only having to stop 2 times throughout our 10 hour trip down the river did I have to stop and air it up only because I was super worried. The tube survived our crazy trip down the river even hitting many rocks along the way. This thing is super durable.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: This item was perfect for tubing down the river with friends
customer_reviews.text: This item was perfect for tubing down the river with friends. It fit a full size cooler, or 2 small ones! (at one point we used it for someone to float in along with the small cooler!) It was a great purchase for the price!! great material, will use it many times.
customer_reviews.author: 313hbomb

customer_reviews.title: Floating cooler
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Held very heavy, beer laden cooler while wewe went tubing with no effort. Would also hold a child very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn M.

customer_reviews.title: floats just find down a river
customer_reviews.text: I used this inflatable cooler raft on the Russian river last weekend, had a blast! Was the only one with cold beers :D The raft is very stable while on the water, sturdily constructed, and I like that it has cup holders and several attachment points for me to tie onto. I wish the product would specify the size of the cooler you need, it's actually quite a large space. My cooler was so small that I was able to put it in sideways. I'm planning on buying a huge cooler to fill the whole space for future trips. overall I love this cooler float and can't wait to take it out again.
customer_reviews.author: Ericson

customer_reviews.title: The perfect place for a cooler.....or a toddler
customer_reviews.text: OK, just kidding as you don't want to turn this into a toddler raft, but this thing really hits the mark. High quality construction, holds the largest cooler you can throw at it, cup holders, lots of places to tie onto it for pulling behind a raft. It's going to get a lot of use for river floating this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Scheffler

product_meta.title: Solstice by Swimline Cooler Raft
product_meta.description:
The Solstice River rough cooler raft is a great hydration companion on those long water escapades. You can get years of relaxation and enjoyment Thanks to the heavy-duty vinyl construction that will make the product last longer and let it withstand the demands of water parks or River tubing. Inflation and deflation of the raft is a breeze due to the oversized, push-in compression valve which makes your effort minimal. Four (4) sturdy vinyl handles two (2) rope tiesfour cup/soda can holders.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Cooler Float. 4 Sturdy vinyl handles. 2 rope ties. Large enough to hold a full size cooler. Four cup/soda can holders. Extra heavy duty vinyl construction.
feature_bullets: Large enough to hold a full size cooler

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
